name: Role Call (LexoRavi)
description:
Role Call is a game for Ludum Dare 51, with the theme of "Every 10 Seconds".

It's the big night, you are nervous. The audience is waiting. Lights, camera, action! The crowd goes wild, and every 10 seconds they decide your fate!

In this arcade-y survival game try to run, jump, and dash the incoming stagehands as the crowd goes wild to change the state of the stage. Can you get a high score?

The Team:

LexoRavi - Director, Programmer

Raflcoopter - Lead Designer, Player Sprites, Boss Sprites

Chip - Programmer

swuff★ - Programmer

doshMobile - Environment Sprites

Kerocola - Designer, Enemy Sprites

Bolty - VFX Sprites, Minor Environmental Sprites

Ren - UI Design and Sprites, Logo Design

Chumby - Composer, Sound Effects

Ryburi- Sound Effects
